title: Multiplying Polynomials
description: Wave 1: Mastering basic multiplication of monomials and binomials.

questions.question: Multiply: (p + q + r)(p² + q² + r² - pq - qr - rp)
Multiply: (x + y - z)(x - y + z)(-x + y + z)
choices: -x³ - y³ - z³ + x²y + x²z + y²x + y²z + z²x + z²y - 2xyz
x² + y² + z² - xy - xz - yz
questions.answer: -x³ - y³ - z³ + x²y + x²z + y²x + y²z + z²x + z²y - 2xyz

questions.question: Multiply: (a² + ab + b²)(a² - ab + b²)(a⁴ - a²b² + b⁴)
Multiply: (a + b + c)(a² + b² + c² - ab - bc - ca)
Multiply: (x² + xy + y²)(x² - xy + y²)(x⁴ - x²y² + y⁴)
Multiply: (p + q - r)(p - q + r)(-p + q + r)
choices: -p³ - q³ - r³ + p²q + p²r + q²p + q²r + r²p + r²q - 2pqr
p² + q² + r² - pq - pr - qr
questions.answer: -p³ - q³ - r³ + p²q + p²r + q²p + q²r + r²p + r²q - 2pqr

questions.question: Multiply: (m² + mn + n²)(m² - mn + n²)(m⁴ - m²n² + n⁴)
Multiply: (p + q + r)(p² + q² + r² - pq - qr - rp)
Multiply: (x² + y²)(x⁴ - x²y² + y⁴)(x⁸ - x⁴y⁴ + y⁸)
Multiply: (a + b - c)(a - b + c)(-a + b + c)
choices: -a³ - b³ - c³ + a²b + a²c + b²a + b²c + c²a + c²b - 2abc
a² + b² + c² - ab - ac - bc
questions.answer: -a³ - b³ - c³ + a²b + a²c + b²a + b²c + c²a + c²b - 2abc

questions.question: Multiply: (x + y)(x - y)(x² + y²)(x⁴ + y⁴)(x⁸ + y⁸)
